issue.title: [Python] It is impossible to skip s3 or hdfs tests with pytest markers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13504](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13504). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The tests should be skippable with
```bash

pytest pyarrow/tests -m "(not s3)"
```
but that doesn't deselect all the s3 tests
